sourcesContent: import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: "app-breeds-list", templateUrl: "./breeds-list.component.html", styleUrls: ["./breeds-list.component.scss"], }) export class BreedsListComponent { breeds: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.http.get('https://catfact.ninja/breeds').subscribe(res => { this.breeds = res; console.log(this.breeds); }); } public getNextBreeds() { this.http.get(this.breeds.next_page_url).subscribe(res => { this.breeds = res; console.log(this.breeds); }); } }
